name: Kango Islands - Flower Swipe
description:
Help Kango the kangaroo to collect magical flowers from the lost islands! It's an epic floral adventure with many challenging levels!
Don't wait for lives, don't bother your friends to progress, just play and have fun!

Swipe and connect the colorful flowers, to make chains and match them. Longer chains give bonus points and power-ups. Clear the dry sand and the rocks, or collect the buried gems! Include the swiped flowers to reach the level goal!
Getting overgrown? Activate flower-ups for a helping plant!

Have a blast by connecting the blossom and swiping the rose petals! If you like match 3 puzzle games, connect and match, swipe and match or any type of casual match 3 puzzle game then Kango Islands is the ultimate saga for you!


For more match-3 sweetness, go to https://www.facebook.com/SmileyGamer
